name: Carnage Cross
description:
Carnage Cross is a vehicular death match game with seven playable drivers, nine levels, and an arsenal of weapons, specials, opponents and roguelike abilities at your disposal. Play the first episode, "Leo's Report", or pick and choose the driver and maps you want to play.

Playable Carnage Cross: Episode 1, "Leo's Report" - a singleplayer story mode about one driver and his crusade for righteous fury, includes battle mode with 7 drivers and specials, 9 maps, 6 different pick-ups, 15 rogue-like abilities, different opponents and car color options.
